creates the covidcast epidata helper

Source: R/covidcast.R
covidcast_epidata.Rd

Creates a helper object that can use auto-complete to help find covidcast sources and signals.

covidcast_epidata(base_url = global_base_url, timeout_seconds = 30)

Arguments

base_url

optional alternative API base url

timeout_seconds

the maximum amount of time to wait for a response

Value

an instance of covidcast_epidata

Examples

covidcast_api <- covidcast_epidata()
print(covidcast_api) # print available sources and signals
#> [1] "COVIDcast Epidata Fetcher"
#> [1] "Sources:"
#>                          source                                        name
#> chng                       chng                           Change Healthcare
#> covid-act-now     covid-act-now                         Covid Act Now (CAN)
#> doctor-visits     doctor-visits                   Doctor Visits From Claims
#> fb-survey             fb-survey Delphi US COVID-19 Trends and Impact Survey
#> google-symptoms google-symptoms               Google Symptoms Search Trends
#> [1] "14 more..."
#> [1] "Signals"
#>                                    source                        signal
#> chng:smoothed_outpatient_cli         chng       smoothed_outpatient_cli
#> chng:smoothed_adj_outpatient_cli     chng   smoothed_adj_outpatient_cli
#> chng:smoothed_outpatient_covid       chng     smoothed_outpatient_covid
#> chng:smoothed_adj_outpatient_covid   chng smoothed_adj_outpatient_covid
#> chng:smoothed_outpatient_flu         chng       smoothed_outpatient_flu
#>                                                                            name
#> chng:smoothed_outpatient_cli                        COVID-Related Doctor Visits
#> chng:smoothed_adj_outpatient_cli     COVID-Related Doctor Visits (Day-adjusted)
#> chng:smoothed_outpatient_covid                    COVID-Confirmed Doctor Visits
#> chng:smoothed_adj_outpatient_covid COVID-Confirmed Doctor Visits (Day-adjusted)
#> chng:smoothed_outpatient_flu                  Influenza-Confirmed Doctor Visits
#> [1] "456 more..."
fb_survey <- covidcast_api$sources$`fb-survey` # tab completion for sources
print(fb_survey) # print a verbose list of available signals
#> [1] "Delphi US COVID-19 Trends and Impact Survey"
#> [1] "fb-survey"
#> [1] "We conduct the Delphi US COVID-19 Trends and Impact Survey (CTIS) in partnership with Facebook. Every day, Delphi surveys tens of thousands of Facebook users, asking them a broad set of COVID-related questions, including whether they, or anyone in their household, are currently experiencing COVID-related symptoms."

smoothed_cli <- fb_survey$signals$smoothed_cli # tab completion for signals
print(smoothed_cli)
#> [1] "COVID-Like Symptoms (Unweighted 7-day average)"
#> [1] "fb-survey:smoothed_cli"
#> [1] "Estimated percentage of people with COVID-like illness "
df <- smoothed_cli$call("nation", "us", epirange(20210405, 20210410))
